system_description: ContosoShop – React SPA front-end with REST API in Azure App Service + SQL back-end + Service Bus for transaction decoupling.
issue_summary: Order status updates are delayed in the front-end after checkout completion.

conversation_history.message: After completing checkout, my order status doesn’t update right away on the site. It sometimes takes several minutes.
Thank you for reporting this, Jessica. We are currently investigating the delay in order status updates.
Let me know if you need more details from my side.
